strings: <voice_0x0100184E><se_low>Chen Mui: Greetings. It has been a while since we met like this, with me in human form.

<voice_0x0100184F><se_low>*: Chen Mui! ...What are you doin'!?
You can't show yourself like this!

<voice_0x01001850><se_low>Chen Mui: It is no longer a problem.
He knows everything now.
He has been to the Dragovian Sanctuary.
<voice_0x01001851><se_low>*: Oh. Well that's a relief. ...So why are you still goin' around as a mouse, then?
<voice_0x01001852><se_low>Chen Mui: B-Because I am! Why shouldn't I go around in any form I choose!? It's just convenient, that's all!
<voice_0x01001853><se_low>*: ...I see. Convenient. Because you get carried around rather than havin' to walk, eh?
<voice_0x01001854><se_low>Chen Mui: L-Let's just drop this! I only turned back into human form so I could thank you!

<voice_0x01001855><se_low>Chen Mui: You have been of great help to us.
My gratitude is as deep and full as the ocean.
<voice_0x01001856><se_low>Chen Mui: ...So, anyway...it is time I transformed back into my mouse form. Excuse me.
